name: Nas
bio: Nasir Jones is a New York rapper widely regarded for vivid street storytelling and poetic realism, debuting with the landmark album Illmatic.

name: Jay-Z
bio: Shawn Corey Carter is a Brooklyn rapper and entrepreneur known for slick wordplay, business acumen, and sustained cultural dominance.

name: Tupac Shakur
bio: Tupac Amaru Shakur was a socially conscious and emotionally raw rapper whose music blended activism, vulnerability, and street realism.

name: The Notorious B.I.G.
bio: Christopher Wallace was a Brooklyn rapper celebrated for effortless flow, vivid narratives, and defining East Coast hip-hop in the 1990s.

name: Andre 3000
bio: Andre Benjamin is known for boundary-pushing creativity, eccentric style, and genre-bending lyricism as one half of OutKast.

name: Lil Wayne
bio: Dwayne Michael Carter Jr. is a prolific Southern rapper known for punchline-heavy freestyles, influence on modern rap, and vast catalog.

name: J. Cole
bio: Jermaine Cole is a North Carolina rapper known for introspective lyricism, relatable themes, and self-produced albums.

name: Drake
bio: Aubrey Drake Graham is a Canadian rapper and singer known for melodic rap, emotional transparency, and mainstream dominance.

name: MF DOOM
bio: Daniel Dumile was an underground legend known for abstract lyricism, dense rhyme schemes, and a masked supervillain persona.

name: Kanye West
bio: Kanye West is a Chicago artist and producer whose experimental albums reshaped hip-hop production, sound, and artistic ambition.

name: Travis Scott
bio: Jacques Bermon Webster II is a Houston rapper known for psychedelic trap production, immersive aesthetics, and high-energy performances.

name: JID
bio: Destin Choice Route is an Atlanta rapper celebrated for elite technical ability, rapid flows, and lyrical precision.

name: Denzel Curry
bio: Denzel Rae Don Curry is a Florida rapper blending aggression, introspection, and genre-bending experimentation.

name: Future
bio: Nayvadius DeMun Wilburn is an Atlanta rapper who pioneered modern trap melodies and emotionally charged street narratives.

name: Tyler, The Creator
bio: Tyler Gregory Okonma is a creative force known for bold artistic evolution, genre fusion, and hands-on production.

name: Playboi Carti
bio: Jordan Terrell Carter is an experimental rapper known for minimalist lyrics, vocal experimentation, and influential rage aesthetics.

name: 21 Savage
bio: Sh√©yaa Bin Abraham-Joseph is an Atlanta-based rapper known for deadpan delivery and cold, minimalist street storytelling.

name: Lil Baby
bio: Dominique Armani Jones is a modern Atlanta rapper recognized for consistent output, smooth flow, and street-to-mainstream crossover.

name: A$AP Rocky
bio: Rakim Athelaston Mayers is a Harlem rapper known for fashion-forward artistry, Southern-influenced flows, and stylish delivery.

name: Joey Bada$$
bio: Jo-Vaughn Virginie Scott is a Brooklyn rapper who bridges classic boom-bap sensibilities with modern consciousness.
